targets.rawSql: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(areaName) FROM area WHERE areaId IN ($electoralDistrictIds)

SELECT
  CONCAT(
    SUM(IF(ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)), "/", COUNT(*), " - ",
    ROUND(SUM(IF(ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated.completedSections = totalSections, 1, 0)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  ) AS ""
FROM
(SELECT
  SUM(IF(verifiedTallySheetCount = totalTallySheetCount, 1, 0)) AS completedSections, COUNT(*) AS totalSections
FROM
  ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status
WHERE
  ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.incrementId IN (SELECT MAX(ext_pe2020_dashboard_increment.id) from ext_pe2020_dashboard_increment WHERE ext_pe2020_dashboard_increment.active=1)
  and ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.electionId = $rootElectionId
  and ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.electoralDistrictId IN ($electoralDistrictIds)
  and ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.templateName = "PE-27"
  and ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.voteType = "NonPostal"
GROUP BY
  ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status.countingCentreId) AS ext_pe2020_dashboard_tally_sheet_status_aggregated

WHERE

ORDER BY createdAt

list.definition: SELECT CONCAT(electionId, ' - ', electionName) as __text,  electionId as __value from election WHERE electionTemplateName = 'PARLIAMENT_ELECTION_2020' and parentElectionId IS NULL;
list.label: Election
list.name: rootElectionId
list.query: SELECT CONCAT(electionId, ' - ', electionName) as __text,  electionId as __value from election WHERE electionTemplateName = 'PARLIAMENT_ELECTION_2020' and parentElectionId IS NULL;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  areaName AS __text, areaId AS __value 
FROM area, election 
WHERE 
  election.electionId = area.electionId and election.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId and areaType = 'ElectoralDistrict';
list.name: electoralDistrictIds
list.query:
SELECT 
  areaName AS __text, areaId AS __value 
FROM area, election 
WHERE 
  election.electionId = area.electionId and election.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId and areaType = 'ElectoralDistrict';
